metadata.witw_validation: Aircraft ID 149 (CR.42 Falco) confirmed in WITW database. Specifications: biplane fighter, introduced Dec 1939, obsolete Dec 1941, 2x 12.7mm Breda-SAFAT MGs, ~695km range, ~274 km/h max speed. Matches operational timeframe for Q4 1940.
